cvList.title: Fullstack mobile app developer
cvList.desc:
A mobile game build with Flutter / Dart. Backend using AWS Lambda / DynamoDB / Typescript / Node.js
(see https://gitee.com/NEWBRAN/create-tsdev  https://gitee.com/NEWBRAN/aws-v-cli
these are tool set I developed for this project, and open source recently)
Using Websocket / MQTT engine for live competition session.
An online shopping cart (for paying subscriptions) built with Vue 3 using Vite / paypal as payment solution.
And the ad website also using the same tech stack (demo available upon request)

cvList.title: Fullstack developer
cvList.desc:
Building MVP and later on turn into their own internal trading desk for global clients.
      UI - React (using PreactX engine instead of the FB react) Antd (Ant Design by Alibaba) plus jsonql API library using its own built-in JWT validation schema
      Backend - Node.js Koa with Jsonql. Database using TiDB (MySQL engine) access via TypeORM (Model layer written in Typescript). Create an experimental Blockchain database/engine using BlockBook (V.1) for using their smart contract feature (using PoS)
      Mobile - a prototype mobile app for customers to use as a 2FA, using Flutter / Dart / Kotlin.
      Desktop - a prototype app build with Electron for multiple platforms to view real-time data, also a built-in chat client using the Jsonql WebSocket extension.
